member.name: OCSP_REQUEST_ENTRY
member.summary: The OCSP_REQUEST_ENTRY structure contains information about a single certificate in an online certificate status protocol (OCSP) request. This structure populates the rgRequestEntry member.

member.name: OCSP_REQUEST_ENTRY.CertId
member.summary: An structure that specifies the target certificate.

member.name: OCSP_REQUEST_ENTRY.cExtension
member.summary: The number of elements in the rgExtension array.

member.name: OCSP_REQUEST_ENTRY.rgExtension
member.summary: An array of pointers to structures, each of which contains information about the CertId certificate.
